About

Light. Place. Time.

The Short Version

I'm Wolf, and Archive 35 is where a lifetime of photography finds its home.

The Longer Story

In 2008, I picked up a camera. I haven't put it down since.

"I photograph places the way you remember them, not the way they look in a brochure. Light is the subject. The landscape is just where it lands."
